Out of Sight is a horror game that weaves a haunting narrative with immersive gameplay, inviting players into a world where danger and uncertainty lurk in every shadow. Developed by The Gang, the game promises a journey that blends psychological discomfort with emotional storytelling.

Story and Setting

Players follow Sophie, who regains her sight through her beloved Teddy and must navigate a sinister mansion filled with secrets. Every decision matters, as missteps could lead to capture and an uncertain fate. The narrative centers on survival and hope, compelling p
title: Out of Sight – Launch Trailer

Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping is the next entry from Happy Broccoli Games, inviting players to step into the webbed feet of a troubled duck investigator. With its blend of humor and mystery, the game is set to launch on May 22, 2025.

Story and Setting

Players will follow Eugene McQuacklin, a duck detective dealing with the ghosts of his past—including a failed marriage and a persistent bread addiction. Set within a mysterious campsite rumored to be haunted, the story focuses on Eugene's personal struggles as
title: Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping – Launch Trailer

Scratch The Cat is an action-adventure 3D platformer that blends musical energy with expressive movement. Developed by FlatPonies, the game follows DJ Scratch on a quest to recover a shattered record collection and restore harmony to a world powered by sound.

Story and Setting

Players take on the role of DJ Scratch, a nimble feline whose prized records have been stolen and broken by the villainous Snatch The Rat. The journey leads through Melotropolis and beyond, with each region pulsing to its own rhythm. Along the way, players will rescue allies and
title: Scratch The Cat – Announcement Trailer
